title: Church of the Gromp
body:
Hello, I am G4m3r25 from Oceania, and I am one of the many messengers of the Gromp. I am here to promote the Church of our Great Lord the Gromp, and we are all only messengers, as nobody is any higher than this in the Gromp's eyes. The Gromp is the most holy and pure of all beings, because he has 2 outstanding qualities:

1. He is the sexiest creature in the whole of the Rift.
2. He is the most powerful monster, I mean God, on the Rift. Even the Sentinel and the Brambleback need minions to protect them. The Gromp is the only sole leader of a church.

So join our church today! And be in awe of our Great Lord the Gromp!

replies.body: If people like you join the Gromp clan why're you still alive has't he eaten you yet?

I will contest this.
1- He is not the sexiest creature on the rift.
That is being shared right now between Urgot and Azir.
2- He is not the most powerful god. Azir is.

We Acolytes Of Shurima bury your so called "Leader" every day on the rift in dunes of sand.

Shurima will rise again.

A rival chuch, huh?
That's fine. But do not interfere with our great Lord the Gromp, and we shall not with yours.

Not much of a rivalry.
But you can believe in what ever you want.
After all, everyone becomes dust sooner or later.

And every time that happens. Shurima grows stronger.
I two am a proud worshipper of the gromp, someday when the gromp is not satisfied, he will eat us all!!!

That's great to hear. Lord Gromp would be happy for you to be a messenger too. Change your status to "Messenger of Gromp" and send me a friend request, so we can spread the word of the Lord Gromp together!
I would like to Join. Sign me up. I fapped twice already to my Gromp Icon...... >.>

To show you are a messenger of the Gromp, please change your status to "Messenger of Gromp"
And send me a friend request! So we can unite as messengers of the Gromp!
I eat Gromps for breakfast m80
is this a serious clan recruitment haha?!
